name: RainBug
description:
The Idea: To fuse an open world game with some kind of objective and strategy. I intend to add more to the gameplay later, but for now at least I have a little, simple, game unit.

The Game and the Goal: Get the lady bug to the target in the exact number of bricks you have! Meanwhile, make fun and interesting patterns.

The Controls: Use the up and down arrow keys to place bricks and move the ladybug up and down -- left and right to rotate.
